hero.subtitle: Discover a refuge in the heart of Bogotá, designed to connect, explore, and renew your spirit.

introduction.title: More than a place to stay
introduction.subtitle: We are a hub for conscious travelers. Our brand is built on providing an "Inner Experience" that connects guests with themselves, with others, and with the soul of Bogotá.

self.title: With Yourself
self.description: Meditation, wellness, and personal reflection spaces for your inner growth.

others.title: With Others
others.description: A vibrant community of conscious travelers sharing authentic experiences.

city.title: With Bogotá
city.description: Authentic cultural immersion in the heart of the Colombian capital.

accommodations.title: Our Sanctuaries of Rest
accommodations.subtitle: Designed for different needs and budgets, all with the same commitment to quality and experience.

list.title: Private Patio Studio
list.description: A refuge of elegance and serenity in the heart of La Candelaria. This first-floor studio offers a private bathroom and a kitchen equipped with a fridge, microwave, and coffee maker. Its beautiful interior patio, for exclusive use of the studio guests, provides an ideal space to relax and enjoy the outdoors in total privacy. Perfect for those seeking calm, comfort, and connection in an intimate environment with high-speed Wi-Fi.

list.title: Deluxe Double Studio
list.description: Discover the perfect balance between elegance and well-being in our Deluxe Double Studio. This space is designed for a unique experience of rest and harmony. It has a private bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, microwave, coffee maker, and everything you need for your comfort. Its balcony with a mountain view invites you to breathe tranquility and connect with the energy of La Candelaria. It also has high-speed Wi-Fi to keep you connected in an environment of serenity and comfort.

list.title: Superior Studio
list.description: Immerse yourself in an experience of rest and well-being in our Superior Studio, a space where elegance combines with tranquility. Its imposing window, spanning the entire back wall, fills the room with natural light and creates a warm, relaxing atmosphere. It has a private bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, microwave, and coffee maker, ideal for long stays or comfort getaways. It also has high-speed Wi-Fi to keep you connected while enjoying serenity and style.

list.title: Balcony Studio
list.description: Enjoy a refuge of calm and well-being in our Interior Studio with Balcony. This elegant space features a private bathroom and a kitchen equipped with a fridge, microwave, and coffee maker, designed for your total comfort. Its balcony, facing the building's interior, provides an intimate and quiet atmosphere, ideal for relaxing, reading, or simply breathing in tranquility. High-speed Wi-Fi complements an experience where serenity, comfort, and elegance meet in perfect harmony.

list.title: Standard Studio
list.description: Relax in an atmosphere of elegance and serenity in our Standard Studio. This space has a private bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, microwave, and coffee maker, ideal for a comfortable and revitalizing stay. Its large window facing the building's interior allows natural light to flood the room, creating a sense of peace and harmony. It also has high-speed Wi-Fi so you can always stay connected while enjoying the well-being and calm of La Candelaria.

list.title: Standard Triple Studio
list.description: Comfort, elegance, and spaciousness come together in our Standard Triple Studio, ideal for sharing moments of rest and well-being. It features two beds, a private bathroom, and a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, microwave, and coffee maker. Its large window facing the building's interior fills the space with natural light, creating a warm and quiet atmosphere. Perfect for three people seeking comfort, connection, and serenity, with high-speed Wi-Fi included.

list.title: Basic Studio
list.description: Simplicity, comfort, and well-being come together in our Basic Studio, located on the building's first floor. This space has a private bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, microwave, and coffee maker, ideal for those seeking a practical stay without losing the essence of rest. Its front-facing window lets you enjoy natural light and the vibrant atmosphere of La Candelaria. It also has high-speed Wi-Fi, creating a perfect balance between comfort, elegance, and serenity.

list.title: 6-Bed Mixed Dorm Room
list.description: A comfortable and functional option for travelers seeking well-being and connection. This shared room has six beds and a balcony facing the front of the building, where you can enjoy the view and the authentic atmosphere of La Candelaria. Each bed is rented individually and includes access to a shared, fully equipped bathroom and kitchen, plus high-speed Wi-Fi. An ideal space to rest, socialize, and live a quiet experience in the historic center of Bogotá.

list.title: 4-Bed Mixed Dorm Room
list.description: A cozy and elegant space designed for travelers who value tranquility and well-being. This shared room has four beds and is rented individually. It has a fully equipped shared bathroom and kitchen, plus high-speed Wi-Fi. Its window towards the back of the building offers a beautiful city view, creating a serene and bright atmosphere ideal for resting, connecting, and enjoying the experience in La Candelaria.

list.title: 4-Bed Female Dorm Room
list.description: A space designed especially for women seeking comfort, safety, and tranquility during their stay. This room has a cozy and elegant atmosphere, with a balcony towards the interior of the building and direct access to the terrace, ideal for enjoying the view and fresh air. Each bed is rented individually and includes access to a fully equipped shared bathroom and kitchen, plus high-speed Wi-Fi. A perfect place to rest, feel safe, and experience La Candelaria in style.

wellness.title: Connect With Yourself and Others
wellness.subtitle: Unique amenities that nourish your physical, mental, and social well-being during your stay.

meditation.title: Meditation Room
meditation.description: A sacred space for inner reflection, equipped with natural elements and an inspiring view of Monserrate. Here you can reconnect with yourself and find the peace you seek on your journey.
meditation.schedule: Group meditation sessions Monday, Wednesday, and Friday
meditation.location: 8:00 am, Las Aguas Inner Experience Building

wordcircle.title: Word Circle
wordcircle.description: Where words unite and fire illuminates. A circular refuge for dialogue and contemplation, reconnecting us with the essence of sharing the present moment.
wordcircle.location: 8:00 pm, Las Aguas Inner Experience Building

gym.title: Equipped Gym
gym.description: Maintain your exercise routine with modern equipment and spacious areas.

sauna.title: Relaxing Sauna
sauna.description: Disconnect and renew your energy in our relaxation space.

coffee.title: Tinto Culture
coffee.description: Our cozy café with the best Colombian beans and a local atmosphere.

common.title: Common Spaces
common.description: Areas designed to connect, work, and share with other travelers.

socialAreas.title: Our Exclusive Spaces
socialAreas.subtitle: We designed every corner thinking of your well-being, productivity, and recreation without leaving home.

carousel.title: Sky View Terrace: The Horizon at Your Feet
carousel.description: A sanctuary in the heights where the sunset comes to life. Enjoy unmatched panoramic views and a refreshing breeze in our open-air lounge, perfect for disconnecting from the urban rhythm.

carousel.title: Elite Fitness Center
carousel.description: Redefine your routine in a state-of-the-art gym. Equipped with the latest technology and functional training zones, this space inspires you to reach your physical potential with no excuses.

carousel.title: The Social Hub
carousel.description: The vibrant heart of our community. A sophisticated lounge with contemporary design, ideal for reading afternoons, conversations with neighbors, or simply enjoying interior design at its finest.

carousel.title: Workspace Studio & Coworking
carousel.description: Elevate your productivity in an environment designed for success. With high-speed connectivity, ergonomic furniture, and a quiet atmosphere, it is the perfect extension of your office just steps from your home.

carousel.title: Wellness Sanctuary & Sauna
carousel.description: A thermal refuge to purify body and mind. Immerse yourself in a deep relaxation experience, where heat and silence combine to eliminate stress and revitalize your senses.

carousel.title: Grill Garden & Gourmet BBQ
carousel.description: The perfect stage for your best hosting. A premium grilling area under the stars, designed to create unforgettable culinary memories with family and friends in a festive and exclusive setting.

testimonials.title: Transformative Experiences
testimonials.subtitle: Discover why travelers from all over the world choose Las Aguas for their inner experience.

list.name: Correcaminos
list.text: Las Aguas was our first stop on a trip through Colombia, and there couldn't have been a better choice. We came with the idea of resting for a couple of days after the trip and ended up finding friends with whom we shared great moments, the hostel staff. Jeicob's tour of the local neighborhoods was the best experience and I highly recommend it. Besides him, both Sergio and the other workers and guests gave us a wonderful stay that we will never forget.

list.name: Juliana
list.text: The hostel is a good place to stay, it is very well located in La Candelaria with easy walking access to several tourist sites in the city center. What we liked most was the kindness of the hostel staff, always attentive to our needs.

list.name: Hernán
list.text: As a digital nomad, I found the perfect balance between productivity and well-being. The WiFi is excellent, the gym spotless, and the community inspiring.

surroundings.title: Surroundings
surroundings.subtitle: Located in the heart of the Las Aguas neighborhood, you'll have immediate access to the best of Bogotá.

list.title: Historic Center
list.description: Just steps away from Bogotá's main historical sites.

list.title: Monserrate
list.description: Privileged view of the city's most emblematic mountain.

list.title: Flea Market
list.description: Find unique treasures at the most famous antique market.

list.title: Local Cafés
list.description: Discover the coffee culture in the best cafés in the neighborhood.

experiences.title: Local Routes & Experiences
experiences.subtitle: Immerse yourself in authentic culture with our exclusive guided tours for guests.

list.title: Favela Tour: Life & Color
list.description: A respectful and fascinating immersion into the heart of the community. Discover spontaneous architecture, urban art, and the warmth of its inhabitants from a new perspective.

list.title: Celestial Arch Viewpoint
list.description: A scenic hike that rewards effort with the most impressive views of the valley. The perfect spot where nature embraces the city.

list.title: Urban Graffiti Route
list.description: Explore an open-air museum. Tour iconic murals and learn the stories of resistance and hope depicted on the walls by local artists.

list.title: Cultural Tour: Living Roots
list.description: A journey through time in the historic district. Gastronomy, music, and architecture come together to tell you the unwritten history of our region.

finalCta.title: Your transformation journey awaits
finalCta.subtitle: Join our community of conscious travelers and discover everything Bogotá and your inner self have to offer.
finalCta.location: Located in the heart of the Las Aguas neighborhood, Bogotá

footer.description: More than just a place to stay, we are an experience that connects conscious travelers with the heart of Bogotá and their own inner transformation.
